tool_description: Calculate the carbon footprint in various situations, such as travel and hydro usage.
name: CarbonFootprint
title: CarbonFootprint

api_list.name: AirQualityHealthIndex
api_list.description: Return the official air quality health index (1 to 10) bases on key parameters.The national AQHI is based on three-hour average concentrations of ground-level ozone (O3), nitrogen dioxide (NO2), and fine particulate matter (PM2.5). O3 and NO2 are measured in parts per billion (ppb) while PM2.5 is 	 measured in micrograms per cubic metre (ug/m3)

required_parameters.name: O3
required_parameters.description: The ground-level ozone (O3) in parts per billion (ppb).in

required_parameters.name: NO2
required_parameters.description: The nitrogen dioxide (NO2),  in parts per billion (ppb)

required_parameters.name: PM
required_parameters.description: The fine particulate matter (PM2.5), PM2.5 is 	 * measured in micrograms per cubic metre (ug/m3).

api_list.name: TreeEquivalent
api_list.description: Calculate how many trees it took to create paper.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: The unit (kg or lb) used for the weight

api_list.name: TraditionalHydroToCarbonFootprint
api_list.description: Calculate CO2e from the use of traditional hydro provider

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The country or continent providing the hydro. Can be any of USA, Canada, UK, Europe, Africa, LatinAmerica, MiddleEast, OtherCountry

api_list.name: CleanHydroToCarbonFootprint
api_list.description: Return the CO2e in Kg from the consumption of clean hydro energy

required_parameters.name: energy
required_parameters.description: The source of the clean energy. Can be Solar, Wind, HydroElectric, Biomass, Geothermal, Tidal or OtherCleanEnergy

required_parameters.name: consumption
required_parameters.description: The amount of energy consumed in KWH..

api_list.name: FuelToCO2e
api_list.description: Transform liters of Diesel, Petrol or LPG into CO2 Equivalent in Kg.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type can be Petrol, Diesel, LPG.

required_parameters.name: litres
required_parameters.description: The number of litres to calculate from.

api_list.name: CarbonFootprintFromCarTravel
api_list.description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a travel by car

required_parameters.name: vehicle
required_parameters.description: The type of car, either SmallDieselCar, MediumDieselCar, LargeDieselCar, MediumHybridCar, LargeHybridCar, MediumLPGCar, LargeLPGCar, MediumCNGCar, LargeCNGCar, SmallPetrolVan, LargePetrolVan, SmallDielselVan, MediumDielselVan, LargeDielselVan, LPGVan, CNGVan, SmallPetrolCar, MediumPetrolCar, LargePetrolCar, SmallMotorBike, MediumMotorBike, LargeMotorBike

api_list.name: CarbonFootprintFromFlight
api_list.description: Calculate CO2e in Kg from a travel by air.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of flight, any of DomesticFlight, ShortEconomyClassFlight, ShortBusinessClassFlight, LongEconomyClassFlight, LongPremiumClassFlight, LongBusinessClassFlight, LongFirstClassFlight

api_list.name: CarbonFootprintFromMotorBike
api_list.description: Returns the CO2e in Kg from a motorbike travel

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of motorbike, can be any of SmallMotorBike, MediumMotorBike, LargeMotorBike

api_list.name: CarbonFootprintFromPublicTransit
api_list.description: Return CO2e in Kg from the use of public transporation.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: The type of transportation, one of: Taxi, ClassicBus, EcoBus, Coach, NationalTrain, LightRail, Subway, FerryOnFoot, FerryInCar
